article_title: Preet Bharara Remains Grim About Albany
article_text:
After winning the convictions of men who were once two of the most powerful people in New York state politics, Manhattan U.S. Attorney Preet Bharara took to the airwaves on Monday to articulate what was strongly suggested at the trials: that Albany lawmakers do “a pretty poor job of self-policing.”

Mr. Bharara appeared on WNYC’s “The Brian Lehrer Show” three days after the conviction of former state Senate Majority Leader Dean Skelos and his son Adam, which followed the Nov. 30 conviction of former Assembly Speaker...

twitter.description: Preet Bharara tells WNYC that there’s still ‘a deep problem of corruption in Albany.’
